thing-type.label: NorthQ NQ-9121
thing-type.description:
NorthQ Gas Meter

Device Overview

Brief description here

Inclusion and Exclusion

To include the device into the network...

To exclude the device from the network...

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: IR Listen period
parameter.description: Additional time for feedback measurement. Should always be 0.

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: IR Pulse Width
parameter.description: Adjusts transmit signal so received signal will in average be equal to this values.

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Poll / Wake up frequency
parameter.description: Wake device up this many times per second. This value also controls number of measurements per second on mechanical meters

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: Pulse Threshold Low
parameter.description: Low detection threshold for wheel meters

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Pulse Threshold High
parameter.description: High detection threshold for wheel meters

parameter.name: config_9_4
parameter.label: 9: Pulse count
parameter.description: Current pulse count in device (pulse count / pulse factor = kWh)

parameter.name: config_10_2
parameter.label: 10: Keep alive period
parameter.description: How many ticks before going back to sleep in normal wakeup mode.

parameter.name: config_11_2
parameter.label: 11: Real-time mode
parameter.description: Set this to enter real-time mode from remote. Contains seconds * poll frequency before going back to sleep. If you press the button once this value will be set.

parameter.name: wakeup_interval
parameter.label: Wakeup Period
parameter.description: Set the wakeup period in seconds

parameter.name: wakeup_node
parameter.label: Wakeup Node
parameter.description: The node to which wakeup messages will be sent
